mapper.select: SELECT uc.id AS consignId, uc.consign_num AS consignNum, uc.purchase_num AS purchaseNum, uc.taken_num AS takenNum , uc.remark, uc.create_date AS createDate, so.`name` AS officeName, mg.goods_sn AS goodsNo, mg.goods_name AS goodsName FROM mtmydb.mtmy_user_consign uc LEFT JOIN mtmydb.mtmy_goods mg ON uc.goods_id = mg.goods_id LEFT JOIN trains.sys_office so ON uc.office_id = so.id WHERE uc.mtmy_user_id = #{userId} ORDER BY uc.create_date DESC

SELECT uc.id AS 'consignId', uc.consign_num AS 'consignNum', uc.purchase_num AS 'purchaseNum', uc.taken_num AS 'takenNum' , uc.remark, uc.create_date AS 'createDate', uc.goods_id AS 'goodsId', uc.goods_name AS 'goodsName', mg.goods_sn AS 'goodsNo', so.`name` AS 'officeName', uc.office_id AS 'officeId' FROM mtmydb.mtmy_user_consign uc LEFT JOIN mtmydb.mtmy_goods mg ON uc.goods_id = mg.goods_id LEFT JOIN trains.sys_office so ON uc.office_id = so.id WHERE uc.id = #{consignId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO mtmydb.mtmy_user_consign( mtmy_user_id, order_id, goods_id, goods_name, purchase_num, consign_num, taken_num, remark, create_by, create_date, office_id ) VALUES ( #{userId}, #{orderId}, #{goodsId}, #{goodsName}, #{purchaseNum}, #{consignNum}, #{takenNum}, #{remark}, #{createBy.name}, SYSDATE(), #{officeId} )
mapper.update: UPDATE mtmydb.mtmy_user_consign SET order_id =#{orderId}, goods_id =#{goodsId}, purchase_num=#{purchaseNum}, consign_num=#{consignNum}, taken_num=#{takenNum}, remark=#{remark}, office_id =#{officeId} WHERE id = #{consignId}
